question: Operating Rules and Procedures ( OR&P )
answer:
_Some of the below links are only available when connected to BART internal admin network. Please see_ [**_Remote Access Instructions_**](https://sfbartd.sharepoint.com/sites/vira/Vira%20Documents/Forms/AllItems.aspx?id=%2Fsites%2Fvira%2FVira%20Documents%2FRemote%20Access%20Instructions%2Epdf&parent=%2Fsites%2Fvira%2FVira%20Documents) _to choose a way to connect to the BART admin network._ Contact System Safety's [**Robb Bury**](mailto:rbury@bart.gov) for questions related to:

* Interpretation of operating rules and procedures
* The [**Operations Rules and Procedures Manual (OR&P)**](http://techinfo.adm.bart.gov/ORP/ORP_Rev_7.pdf) _(you can also visit_ [**_System Safety's MyBART page_**](https://sfbartd.sharepoint.com/sites/systemsafety) view _the_ [**_OR&P_**](https://sfbartd.sharepoint.com/sites/systemsafety#or-p) _or_ [**_Safety Rule of the Week_**](https://sfbartd.sharepoint.com/sites/systemsafety#safety-rule-of-the-week) _for more information)_
* Understanding the Roadway Worker Protection (RWP) program
* The [**Roadway Worker Protection (RWP) Manual**](https://sfbartd.sharepoint.com/sites/systemsafety/RWP/Forms/All%20Documents_Wide.aspx?id=%2Fsites%2Fsystemsafety%2FRWP%2FRWPM%5FFinal%5FMay2016%2Epdf&parent=%2Fsites%2Fsystemsafety%2FRWP) _you can also visit_ [**_System Safety's MyBART page_**](https://sfbartd.sharepoint.com/sites/systemsafety) _and view the_ [**_RWP_**](https://sfbartd.sharepoint.com/sites/systemsafety#railway-worker-protection) _section for more information._
* CPUC issues
* Understanding your role regarding the Safety Management System
* Complying with a rail related accident/incident investigation

Additional: [**System Safety Forms**](https://sfbartd.sharepoint.com/SitePages/Forms.aspx#system-safety)[**System Safety Documents, Policies, and Procedures**](https://sfbartd.sharepoint.com/SitePages/Documents.aspx#system-safety)

question: Employment Verification
answer: For employment verification, please use The Work Number service. Visit [**theworknumber.com**](https://www.theworknumber.com) and use BART Employer Code: 11170.

question: Internal Job Opportunities
answer: To view and apply for internal job opportunities, visit the BART Jobs page on the internal network. _The link below is only available when connected to BART internal admin network._ [**BART Jobs**](http://sharepoint.bart.domain/sites/hr/Pages/Jobs.aspx)
